name: Primary
aboutCourse: This course follows the full PGCE programme at Kingston University. You will be enrolled at Kingston University and all information about the course and assignments will be through them.
interviewProcess: You will be interviewed at Latchmere School. You will sit an English and Maths test but you do not need to revise for these. Then there will be a reading task with children and we are looking for how you engage with children, what questions you may ask and what learning is taking place. Then there will be a panel interview.
howSchoolPlacementsWork:
Latchmere will organise both placements so we guarantee that you will be placed in Kingston schools. One of the placements will be at Latchmere itself.

The first placement begins in October and lasts until Christmas and the second placement is from March to the end of June.
personalQualities: We are looking for trainees who are passionate about improving the outcomes for young people. A school is a busy workplace so you need to be flexible, adaptable, resourceful and resilient.
otherRequirements: All trainees will require a criminal record check and will complete a health questionnaire.
